trans-unit.source: Defines endpoint or contract behaviors that can export custom metadata.
trans-unit.target: Define comportamentos de ponto final ou o contrato que podem exportar metadados personalizados.

trans-unit.source: To modify and extend the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> objects, implement the IWsdlExportExtension interface on an endpoint, contract, or operation behavior (an object that implements either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>) and add the behavior to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar e expandir a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) exportada por <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>objetos, implementa a interface de IWsdlExportExtension um comportamento de ponto final, contrato ou operação (um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior>) e adicione o comportamento para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.Behaviors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IContractBehavior> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can also implement IWsdlExportExtension on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, também pode implementar as IWsdlExportExtension <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > IWsdlExportExtension implementations are never invoked if they are implemented as an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Implementações de IWsdlExportExtension nunca são invocadas se estão implementados como <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior>

trans-unit.source: IWsdlExportExtension does not export custom policy assertions even though [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] exports custom binding policy assertions to the appropriate element inside WSDL.
trans-unit.target: IWsdlExportExtension não exporta asserções de política personalizada, mesmo [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] exporta asserções de política de enlaces personalizada para o elemento adequado no WSDL.

trans-unit.source: If you want to export custom policy assertions, implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se pretender exportar asserções de política personalizada, implemente o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>interface.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The metadata publication process begins by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName> which in turn calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> for each endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Iniciar o processo de publicação de metadados chamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>que por sua vez chama <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>para cada ponto final.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is exported by first exporting its contract.When exporting a contract the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName> calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on all IWsdlExportExtension implementations on the contract, and operation behaviors for that contract.
trans-unit.target: O ponto final é exportado pelo primeiro exportar o respectivo contrato. Ao exportar um contrato de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName>chamadas a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método em todas as implementações de IWsdlExportExtension no contrato e comportamentos de operação para que o contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Operations that use wildcard actions are not exported in metadata, so IWsdlExportExtension implementations on operation behaviors for these operations are not exported.
trans-unit.target: As operações que utilizam ações de carateres universais não são exportadas nos metadados, para que implementações de IWsdlExportExtension no comportamentos de operação para estas operações não são exportadas.

trans-unit.source: After exporting the contract, the port and binding are exported and exported policy expressions are attached.
trans-unit.target: Depois de exportar o contrato, a porta e o enlace são exportados e exportado política expressões estão ligadas.

trans-unit.source: Both the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A> and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> methods provide access to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> so that IWsdlExportExtension implementations can report recoverable errors and warnings through the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Tanto o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>métodos fornecem acesso ao <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>para que as implementações de IWsdlExportExtension podem reportar recuperável erros e avisos através de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The context objects passed into both methods provide convenient mappings from exported WSDL elements to properties of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos de contexto transmitidos para ambos os métodos fornecem mapeamentos convenientes de elementos WSDL exportados às propriedades de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint>objetos.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: If an IWsdlExportExtension implementation throws an exception on export, the generated metadata is in an inconsistent state and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> object should be discarded.
trans-unit.target: Se uma implementação de IWsdlExportExtension emite uma exceção na exportação, os metadados gerado estão num estado inconsistente e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>objecto deve ser eliminado.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Custom export extension must run after the built-in serializer populates the service description.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A extensão de exportação personalizado tem de executar após o serializador incorporado preenche a descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for a contract.
trans-unit.target: Escreve os elementos personalizados do Web Services Description Language (WSDL) para o WSDL gerado para um contrato.

trans-unit.source: The ExportContract method is called when the metadata export system is exporting the contract.
trans-unit.target: O método ExportContract é chamado quando o sistema de exportação de metadados está a exportar o contrato.

trans-unit.source: Only contract and operation behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the ExportContract call.
trans-unit.target: Apenas comportamentos contrato e operação implementar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>obter a chamada de ExportContract.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: All behaviors implementing <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> get the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> call.
trans-unit.target: Todos os comportamentos implementar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>obter o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A>chamar.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension>

trans-unit.source: Use the `context` parameter to modify the WSDL to be exported.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `context` parâmetro para modificar o WSDL ser exportada.

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, consulte a secção de exemplo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the contract information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref> que exporta as informações de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the contract description.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os mapeamentos de elementos WSDL exportados para a descrição do contrato.

trans-unit.source: Writes custom Web Services Description Language (WSDL) elements into the generated WSDL for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Escreve os elementos personalizados do Web Services Description Language (WSDL) para o WSDL gerado para um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: Implement the ExportEndpoint method to modify the WSDL exported for an endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Implemente o método de ExportEndpoint para modificar o WSDL exportado para um ponto final.

trans-unit.source: This method is called after the contract has been exported by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método for chamado depois do contrato foi exportado pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"></xref> that exports the endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter"> </xref> que exporta as informações de ponto final.

trans-unit.source: Provides mappings from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os mapeamentos de elementos WSDL exportados para a descrição de ponto final.
